Articles.Content:
Heres a bunch of war vehicles I made. Mods used were...

Quiz Tech

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111691-WIP-1-0-2-QuizTech-Aero-Pack-v1-2-8-x-Updated-6-9-15-New-Mk2-Service-Bay-and-Small-Tanks!!

BD Armory

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-2-BDArmory-v0-8-3-(critical-fixes-improved-AI)-Dev-Thread-May-30

P.E.W.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117635-WIP-1-0-2-R1-P-E-W-%28A-BDArmory-Addon%29

FantomWorks

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-1-0-2-WIP-FantomWorks-0-3-1-KAX-Part-Pack

(If any are missing please let me know)

(Some of these aircraft don't use all of these mods, but you will need all of these if you want to use all of my aircraft)

A-10 Warthog

https://www.dropbox.com/s/daykdzb6l1334iy/A10%20Warthog%20%28armed%20CAS%29.craft?dl=0

B-5 Heavy Bomber (Armed with CBUs)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/3a5z0vevhgj9ddx/B-5%20%28Bomber%20CBU%29.craft?dl=0

B-11 VTOL Hellstorm (This is basically a rocket artillery platform)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/q791z0960oqmkwi/B-11%20VTOL%20%28Armed%20HELLSTORM%29%20ALT.craft?dl=0

F-1 Drako (Multi-Role Fighter)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/7xqhz2ajvlfq2jx/F-1%20Drako%20%28Armed%20Multi%29.craft?dl=0

F-10 Wyvern (Air-Superiority Fighter)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ado87k5flz5ftqb/F-10%20Wyvern%20%28Armed%20AA%29.craft?dl=0

X-12 VTOL Gunship (Hovering and forward flying CAS plane)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/eo6hu9d5us454e4/X-12%20VTOL%20%28Armed%20CAS%20Gunship%29.craft?dl=0

SCRAMJET (Upper atmosphere-orbital fighter)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/5mcusrnk8j5t668/SCRAMJET.craft?dl=0

XB-1 Reaper (Upper atmosphere bomber)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4a1var69nbxkei3/XB-1%20Reaper%20%28Armed%20CBU%29.craft?dl=0

Thanks for viewing, Please leave any suggestions below
